author: Mitchell Not Mitch

text: One has to wonder what's this series future outside of Japan. DQ10 is an anime style MMO that wouldn't be able to compete in the west with other big games in the genre, while releasing the DQ7 remake for the 3DS is too much of a risk after the low sales of the DQ5 and DQ6 remakes on the DS. As one of my favorite RPG series, I find it a big shame.
author: SupraDarky

text: I have not played a DQ game, but I do know that the music is top notch from the legendary Sugiyama.  I love the music from this series and I am still amazed that Sugiyama is still doing vgm at his age.

text: Luckily, Dragon Quest IX contains enough stuff to keep anyone busy for years, and it's a blessing we got those three remakes on DS (don't forget DQ4 was there too). Anyone wanting to check out the series now has a lot to choose from, still.
